I succeeded installing on seven x86 and seven x64 ; burn first onto a cdr (naming Setup_stopzilla.exe as Stub32i.exe), then put compatibility mode win 98 and administrator privileges both on Stub32i.exe and activator.exe ; stopzilla v 5.0 could not update auto mode ; I installed v 5.0 manually, downloading it from telecharger.com !
